content.raw:
> Any specific reason, or just because it's nice to have things as plugins to be able to keep things modular?  

It's of whimsical functionality, but also to keep things modular, e.g. `deleted_repeated_shots`, `progress_bar`. But I guess having to enable it explicitly might ruin the surprise element of the Easter egg. I’m not fussed either way.
content.html:
Any specific reason, or just because it's nice to have things as plugins to be able to keep things modular?

It's of whimsical functionality, but also to keep things modular, e.g. deleted_repeated_shots, progress_bar. But I guess having to enable it explicitly might ruin the surprise element of the Easter egg. I’m not fussed either way.
